019package org.apache.wiki.markdown.extensions.jspwikilinks.postprocessor;
020
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HtmlInline;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeTracker;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.CharSubSequence;
025import org.apache.wiki.api.core.Context;
026import org.apache.wiki.markdown.nodes.JSPWikiLink;
027import org.apache.wiki.parser.LinkParsingOperations;
028
029
030/**
031 * {@link NodePostProcessorState} which further post processes image links.
032 */
033public class ImageLinkNodePostProcessorState implements NodePostProcessorState< JSPWikiLink > {
034
035    private final boolean isLinkFromText;
036    private final String urlRef;
037    private final LinkParsingOperations linkOperations;
038
039    public ImageLinkNodePostProcessorState( final Context wikiContext, final String urlRef, final boolean isLinkFromText ) {
040        this.isLinkFromText = isLinkFromText;
041        this.urlRef = urlRef;
042        this.linkOperations = new LinkParsingOperations( wikiContext );
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * {@inheritDoc}
047     *
048     * @see NodePostProcessorState#process(NodeTracker, Node)
049     */
050    @Override
051    public void process( final NodeTracker state, final JSPWikiLink link ) {
052        final HtmlInline img = new HtmlInline( CharSubSequence.of( "<img class=\"inline\" " +
053                                                                        "src=\"" + urlRef + "\" " +
054                                                                        "alt=\"" + link.getText().toString() + "\" />" ) );
055        if( ( isLinkFromText && linkOperations.isExternalLink( link.getText().toString() ) ) ||
056                ( isLinkFromText && linkOperations.linkExists( link.getText().toString() ) ) ) {
057            link.setUrl( CharSubSequence.of( urlRef ) );
058            link.removeChildren();
059            link.appendChild( img );
060            state.nodeAdded( img );
061        } else {
062            NodePostProcessorStateCommonOperations.addContent( state, link, img );
063        }
064    }
065
066}
